name: Count of source values in unmapped data
description: The measure analyzes how many source codes are unmapped.

name: Count of deciles appearing in the data (at first observation)
description: The measure analyzes deciles of patients at their first observation. If only certain age groups are being observed, the count of deciles will be low.

name: Patient Provider Ratio
description: The measure looks at how many patients and how many providers are defined in the data. For example, the ratio may indicate abnormaly low number of providers.

name: Percentage of rows in MEASUREMENT table that have NULL recorded as numerical value
description: The measure looks at data recorded in MESUREMENT table. A significant percentage of such rows typically contain a numerical result.

name: Percentage of rows that are unmapped
description: The measure looks at relative size of unmapped data.

name: Count of specialties found in the provider table
description: The measure looks at how many different specialties are present. For general datasets, we expect at least some minimum number of specialties.

name: Count of distinct drug_concept_ids (drug_exposure)
description: Count of distinct drugs. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct drug_concept_ids (drug_era)
description: Count of distinct drugs.

name: Percentage of patients with at least 1 Dx and 1 Rx
description: Indicates patient with some minimum events in their record

name: Percentage of patients with at least 1 Dx and 1 Proc
description: Indicates patient with some minimum events in their record

name: Percentage of patients with at least 1 Meas, 1 Dx and 1 Rx
description: Indicates patient with some minimum events in their record

name: Percentage of patients with at least 1 visit
description: Indicates patient with some minimum events in their record

Metadata about which measures were included when Achilles was last executed. Also allows count of types for certain domains (e.g., visit type). This is least sensitive data about a dataset. Pure metadata.

name: Percentage of patients that have at least one visit by visity type
description: The measure indicates which visit types are present in the dataset by decile using non-sensitive percentage view of count of persons.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Device)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Measurement)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Observation)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Procedure)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Note)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Note)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of distinct concepts (Note)
description: Count of distinct concepts. For most datasets, a low number may indicate a data quality problem.

name: Count of patients by year of death
description: Safe patient count indicates that low counts will not be included in the measure

name: Count of patients by decade
description: Count of deaths by calendar decade (e.g., 1990s, 2000s,2100s). Large aggretion by decade is a less sensitive measure to report.

name: Ratio of born persons to deceased persons by year
